Verb *pour*
************

Documentation for the pour verb in */cmds/verbs/pour.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE

 |  ``pour <something>``
 |  ``pour <something> <preposition> <something>``
 |  ``pour <something> out``
 |  ``empty <something>``

 Pour the coffee, pour the cream into the cup, pour the rest out, empty it all out.
